issue.title: [Doc][Flight] Mention Flight SQL in implementation status
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16384](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16384). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems Flight SQL should probably be present in a way in the implementation status page:
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/status.html#flight-rpc

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16384?focusedCommentId=17528992) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Yes, that would make sense to have. Also cc `[~jduong]`. It might also be nice to have a table of implementations (possibly under the "Powered By" page on the website?)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16384?focusedCommentId=17601834) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14053
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14053>
